title: Move Home feed posts closer to Stories section

requirements.text: Adjust the Home page feed layout so the first post card appears closer to the Stories row (reduce the vertical spacing/margins that push the posts too far down), while keeping the overall Home layout (stories, post feed, right-side suggestions) intact.

quotes: the post are very down move it near the stories section

acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page, the vertical gap between the bottom of the Stories row and the top of the first PostCard is visibly reduced compared to the current implementation.
No overlap occurs between Stories and the first PostCard; spacing remains consistent across common breakpoints (mobile and lg desktop).
The right-side 'Suggested for you' panel remains in its current column and alignment on lg screens.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Keep all changes within the existing React + Tailwind layout patterns already used in the project.
nonGoals: Redesigning PostCard or StoriesRow visual styling beyond adjusting spacing/positioning between them.
Changing the data shown in posts/stories or adding new feed features.
